body_html:
@petewarden Thank you for your response.

I've tried a couple of the approaches and none of them worked for me:

  1. I tried to freeze the graph using the function model.export_savedmodel. Then I've got a folder with the files saved_model.pb, variables.data-00000-of-00001 and variables.index. But there is no checkpoint file in this case. What should be done in this case?

  2. I tried also to freeze the graph using the argument model_dir on creating LinearClassifier. In that case, I've got the files graph.pbtxt, checkpoint and a couple of model.ckpt files. But still no success.

My code is pretty straightforward and can be found here https://github.com/dkhmelenko/fitness-ml/blob/master/simple/Fitness%20Classification.ipynb

I would appreciate any kind of help from your side. Thank you in advance.

I tried to freeze the graph using the function model.export_savedmodel. Then I've got a folder with the files saved_model.pb, variables.data-00000-of-00001 and variables.index. But there is no checkpoint file in this case. What should be done in this case?


I tried also to freeze the graph using the argument model_dir on creating LinearClassifier. In that case, I've got the files graph.pbtxt, checkpoint and a couple of model.ckpt files. But still no success.


My code is pretty straightforward and can be found here https://github.com/dkhmelenko/fitness-ml/blob/master/simple/Fitness%20Classification.ipynb

body:
@petewarden Thank you for your response.

I've tried a couple of the approaches and none of them worked for me:
1. I tried to freeze the graph using the function `model.export_savedmodel`. Then I've got a folder with the files `saved_model.pb`, `variables.data-00000-of-00001` and `variables.index`. But there is no checkpoint file in this case. What should be done in this case?

2. I tried also to freeze the graph using the argument `model_dir` on creating `LinearClassifier`. In that case, I've got the files `graph.pbtxt`, `checkpoint` and a couple of `model.ckpt` files. But still no success.

My code is pretty straightforward and can be found here https://github.com/dkhmelenko/fitness-ml/blob/master/simple/Fitness%20Classification.ipynb

I would appreciate any kind of help from your side. Thank you in advance.
